inclusion.criterion: Obesity degree I-III (Body mass index, BMI >30 Kg/m2)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: FEV1/FVC ratio < 65% in the forced spirometry.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Cognitive disorders that interfere with the administration of the clinical questionnaires.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has FEV1/FVC ratio < 65% in the forced spirometry, which may trigger exclusion. However, overall assessment is likely_ineligible due to other comorbidities.
